title: Tomiura Station (Hokkaido)
text: is a <a href="railway%20station">railway station</a> on the <a href="Muroran%20Main%20Line">Muroran Main Line</a> located in <a href="Noboribetsu%2C%20Hokkaid%C5%8D">Noboribetsu, Hokkaidō</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a> operated by <a href="Hokkaido%20Railway%20Company">Hokkaido Railway Company</a> (JR Hokkaido).
